Gatekeeper Angelina:
All freight entering Giran must pass through this port. It is impossible to move large scale shipments using Gatekeeper magic. If that ever becomes possible, then... No, no! That will never happen!
Now, where should I send you? Not to that hideous Island of Beleth, I hope...
